description: This file contains CMake functions for processing JSON strings, such as removing escape sequences and converting JSON-encoded strings into CMake strings.

methods.name: json_string_to_cmake
methods.description: Converts a JSON string into a CMake string by removing surrounding quotes and unescaping characters.

methods.name: json_string_ref_to_cmake
methods.description: Takes a reference to a JSON string and converts it into a CMake string using json_string_to_cmake.
